name: Vegan Bread
description: This vegan bread is definitely the healthiest bread ever! It's gluten-free, yeast-free, and made with only oats, seeds, and nuts. And it's so easy to make! No bread maker or food processor needed. This bread seriously is life changing!

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients in a large bowl. Cover the bowl and let it rest in the fridge for at least four hours. You could also store it in the fridge overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all of the ingredients in a large bowl. Cover the bowl and let it rest in the fridge for at least four hours. You could also store it in the fridge overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: Generously grease a loaf pan with olive oil. Fill the mixture into the loaf form.
recipeInstructions.name: Generously grease a loaf pan with olive oil. Fill the mixture into the loaf form.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the bread at 390 °F for 70 minutes without preheating the oven. Once the bread is done, carefully remove it from the loaf pan without letting it cool down.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the bread at 390 °F for 70 minutes without preheating the oven. Once the bread is done, carefully remove it from the loaf pan without letting it cool down.
